description: Edge case with very short, minimal messages that provide almost no context until sudden scam reveal. Tests handling of ambiguous early messages.

turns.notes: Extremely minimal message. Not clearly scam. Agent should respond neutrally and ask who this is.
Still no context. Agent may ask for more details or express confusion.
First hint of potential scam topic. Agent should ask what account problem.
Sudden scam reveal with UPI. Should detect and extract immediately. Agent should express concern and ask for clarification.
Minimal pressure. UPI should remain extracted. Agent should say they are trying to send.
